item.title: Todo do about this hugo blog
item.author: ykhorizon@gmail.com (ykhorizon)
item.description: Abstract I’ll mainly discuss about two major aspect of using hugo. Part II is based on my personal experience which may not be suitable for other. PART I: Wanted Feature (Those important feature for me) PART II: Management Optimization Wanted Features Google search inside blog Manage image in static Shortcut for image url hugo hierarchy categories display The categories of hugo is only one-level (It’s called Taxonomies).
